Description: It’s a day you’re looking forward to, but Mums would rather be without tears and cuts in their sensitive skin. From 34 weeks you can prepare, with regular massage using Perineum Massage Oil to enhance flexibility in the skin of the birth area. With sweet almond and vitamin E rich wheatgerm oil, the oil is especially formulated for massages which help the perineum to become more flexible and relaxed, ready for childbirth.
Usage: Can be applied by yourself or with a partner. Massage 3-4 times a week for 5-10 minutes, from the 34th week of pregnancy. Best used after first bathing in warm water and making sure the bladder is empty. Settle into a relaxed, comfortable position. Moisten the thumb (or index finger if your partner is massaging) with Perineum Massage Oil and glide gently over the tissues, ensuring the massage is painless. Insert the finger into the vagina to around the second finger joint. Massage rhythmically with a light touch on the vaginal wall in a rotating movement, like the hand of a clock moving back and forth from 3 to 9. With each massage the tissues and muscles will feel more relaxed and softer, so that the length of the massage can be increased. Massage the perineum until a light tingling can be felt, then massage the tissue between the vagina and anus gently between the thumb and middle fingers. After massage excess oil can be removed by washing in warm water. If you have any concerns about perineal massage, please consult your midwife or doctor.

Gemstones used: magnesite, blue quartz crystal, dumortierite. This precious gemstone oil is produced in an elaborate and patented process.
Usage: - BODY MASSAGE OIL: Gemstone oil can be used like any massage oil. It can also be used for your daily body care after taking a shower (apply to moist skin). It absorbs wonderfully and leaves a gentle scent on the skin. In Monika Grundmann’s Crystal Balance Massage, the oil and massage stones are slightly warmed on a small stove. It can also be used selectively on particular parts of the body. «Regeneration» oil, for instance, has been shown to strengthen the bodies natural resistance when applied to the thymus gland, while «Joy Of Life» oil, applied to the soles of the feet, activates the flow of energy. - REFLEX ZONE MASSAGE: Since the entire body can be stimulated through the reflex zones (feet, hands, back etc.), gemstone oil is also excellently suited to this method of application. - FACIAL OIL: Due to its rapid absorbtion and silky consistency, it is highly recommended for facial massage and facial skincare. - BATH OIL: The effect of the oil is enhanced by the warmth of the water. Two tablespoons per bath are sufficient. The skin is soft and velvety, making subsequent oiling unnecessary.

Usage: Use once or twice each week. Blend approx. 2 heaped teaspoons of Clarifying Clay Mask with an equal amount of water to create a smooth paste. The causes of wrinkles are essentially two: 1. biological causes, related to the natural aging and oxidation of the skin; 2. mechanical causes, due to the contraction of facial muscles, responsible for horizontal and vertical lines, also known as "expression wrinkles". EASY LIFTING SERUM is a extraordinary and effective solution to these problems and quickly acts against expression wrinkles and cutaneous ageing. It has an intensive anti-ageing power and has been realized with pure Aloe Vera organic gel, enriched with Argan Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, Wheat Germs Oil and proteins of Hibiscus seeds. Usage: It is advised to apply EASY LIFTING SERUM one/two times a day on eyes contour area, lips contour area and décolleté avoiding the direct contact with eyes. In order to let the product being better absorbed it is furthermore advised to use small quantities of it and massage until absorption.

Water should be taken not only internally but also through an emulsion which helps to moisturize and nourish the outside layer in a proper way. The product used by men and women in order to give the skin the needed hydration is for sure the "Body Lotion" which can be considered as a present for the wellness of your skin. Laziness, atmospheric agents or just a lack of time and attention to ourselves undermine the natural hydration of our body and it can happen that the water reserve is altered, leading to an unpleasant result: an extremely dry and lifeless skin. To solve this discomfort we sometimes rely just on liquid emulsions which can be easily found in supermarkets with the conviction to do something good for the skin, ignoring the harmful ingredients that these products often contain. Any kind of cream is able to provide hydration and nutrition to the skin, but only apparently! It is thanks to the use of a high quality cream, rich in active principles with emollient, anti-oxidant and nourishing action, that you are able to soften the skin by increasing the humidity content, and to ensure an absorption with results that persist for the whole day and not just for the first moments after application. The result of the careful research carried out by the N&B laboratories is BODY LOTION, a delicate and refined emulsion ideal for the whole body, rich in natural active ingredients, formulated to help your skin to restore a perfect balance. BODY LOTION is able to protect the skin even in case of redness and leaving it for a long soft velvety. Furthermore it does not contain any kind of harmful substance as Parabens, paraffin, SLS and coloring aggressive substances. BODY LOTION has been realized by the N&B Laboratories with organic extracts which directly derives from the warm ground of a farm in Salento, a few steps away from the manufacturing laboratories, guaranteed and certified organic by ECOGRUPPO ITALIA and NATRUE. Thanks to the extraordinary properties of fresh Aloe Vera Gel extract, combined with extra virgin Olive Oil and Vitamin E contained in Wheat Germ Oil, Apricot kernel oil and sweet Almond Oil, Body Lotion fully perform the following three main functions: MOISTURIZING ACTION, when the water reserve is not in the ideal conditions to support the needs of the body, due to outside agents or to carelessness for the own well being. EMOLLIENT ACTION, when, due to the lack of hydration, the skin becomes dry and cracked with results that are often troublesome.PROTECTIVE ACTION, quando la naturale idratazione viene attaccata da elementi esterni che rendono la pelle più sensibile e potenzialmente più aggredibile (even in case of sun exposure). The presence of hyaluronic acid helps to fight skin imperfections caused the passage of time and makes the skin more elastic and tonic. Thanks to the presence of all these active principles and to our meticulous care to create a product we have realized BODY LOTION, a body cream that helps t o restore the right amount of water into the skin in order to reconstitute the hydrolipidic mantle. BODY LOTION can also help to prevent skin aging, giving back the skin softness and elasticity and keeping it toned, elastic and bright. BODY LOTION can be applied at any time of the day on the whole body and is able to give an immediate and pleasant feeling of revitalizing "well-being and freshness". It should be massaged gently and with circular movements until completely absorbed, starting from the bottom and moving upward. It is suitable not only to sweeten and soften the skin after bathing or showering, but also: After shaving.After sun exposure (but even before in order to prepare the skin at best).After depilation.In case of contact with irritants (Detergents etc.).To moisturize and nourish the skin of children. BODY LOTION is a natural product with organic extract, able to provide an immediate feeling of natural wellbeing and freshness, leaving a pleasant scent that will accompany you for the whole day. Description: Contains at least 59% pine heartwood extract PineVital Natural Shampoo nurtures and protects hair and scalp in a special way. The active pine heartwood ingredients provide healthy and supple hair and, moreover, enhance the vitality of the scalp. The spectrum of active substances in the pine extract is completed by natural essences such as camomile extract, stinging nettle extract and wheat proteins which provide sheen, suppleness and body. - Provides shining and supple hair - Soothes and nurtures the scalp - Unique combination of active substances – purely natural PineVital Natural Shampoo is an equally effective and mild natural product, which gently cleans hair and scalp without drying out or straining them. Wheat proteins provide the hair with sheen and suppleness and furthermore enhance the combability of the hair. Good for the scalp The pine heartwood extract strengthens the skin’s own protective barrier, soothes itching and improves skin appearance. Thus, the shampoo on the extract basis is not only valuable for hair care but also ideal for scalp care.
Usage: Massage the usual amount of shampoo into the wet hair. Allow to soak for a short while and rinse well afterwards. To enhance the effect, massage PineVital Liquid Care into hair after drying. For the daily care of normal hair, but also ideal for a dry, itching and scaly scalp.

Description: SANTE plant hair colors are colors to feel good! 100% vegetable hair colour, which gives a natural and lasting colour result. The hair colors are ultra-gentle, long-lasting and care for your hair while dyeing. The vegetable hair colours do not lighten the hair, but adapt to the natural hair colour. The plant hair colours contain only carefully selected natural raw materials such as finely ground organic henna, ground herbs and fruits. Caring wheat proteins give your hair a fascinating shine. SANTE Herbal Hair Colors are mixtures of wheat protein, alginate, henna, cassia, walnut shells, indigo, coffee, beetroot and rhubarb root. The mixture and weight proportions of the ingredients are different in each color. The proven plant hair colours in powder form in 9 expressive shades. The plant hair colour in powder form is simply activated with hot water. The result is a creamy, non-dripping paste which is applied to the hair. Depending on the starting colour and nuance, the application time is between 15 minutes and 2 hours.

Name: FACE MILK ORGANIC BIO
Dialog Product: At least 95% of natural and/or derived natural ingredients, where applicable, stem from organic agriculture or controlled harvesting of wild plants.
Ingredients: Aqua , Aloe Barbadensisi leaf extract*, Cetearyl Alcohol, Olea Europaea fruit extract* , Triticum Vulgare germ oil*, Glycerin, Cocoglycerides, Ceteryl glucoside and Cetearyl Alcohol, Lavandula Angustifolia leaf extract*, Butyrospermum parkii*, Prunus armeniaca kernel extract*, Prunus amygdalus dulcis oil*, Sodium benzoate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Parfum , Limonene . * From Organic farming
Description: Our face is daily exposed to external factors, known as aggressive for the skin as smog, sun and make-up, that make it sensitive and weak. Here comes the need to give specific care and attention to the face, starting from the daily cleansing, to remove impurities and to allow the skin to breathe. Of course it is very important to use an appropriate cleanser in order to get a gentle but deep cleansing and to avoid the use of common soaps containing surfactants and reducing the lipid layer, well-known for leaving the skin dry and fragile. Furthermore, a correct face cleansing is the first rule of any beauty treatment, because, to be truly effective, each kind of cosmetics must be applied when the skin is ready to get it and this happens after a correct cleansing which prepares the face to get all the benefits of the active ingredients contained into Creams. 'Naturalis FACE MILK' is the result of the research carried out by the N&B Laboratories able to give comfort to skin already during the cleaning and to make the skin immediately clean, elastic and smooth , of course all benefits coming from the active principles of organic Aloe Vera gel, organic Wheat germ oil, organic Extra virgin Olive oil, Hyaluronic Acid, Chamomile and Calendula, known for their nourishing, soothing and decongestant functions. 'Naturalis FACE MILK' is a gentle cleansing milk with a natural delicate perfume, able to perfectly cleanse the face skin by softly removing impurities and make-up, in a very natural way and without causing irritation to the skin. The active ingredients make it suitable for all skin types, even the most delicate and sensitive. Perfect also for neck and décolleté. FACE CARE MILK is a natural and gentle cleansing milk which fully respects and softly cleanse our skin, without irritating it, but giving a feeling of soft and pleasant wellbeing.
Usage: Apply (morning and evening) a small quantity of 'Naturalis FACE MILK' on a cotton swab or on a make up sponge and massage with gentle circular massage on face and décolleté to remove impurities. For a complete and deep cleaning action, conclude with 'Naturalis FACE TONIC'.

Making your own scrub with apricot kernel oil at home is very easy: Simply mix sea salt, coconut flower sugar, almond meal or coffee grounds (depending on the desired grain) with the oil, gently apply the mixture in circular movements and rinse with lukewarm water. This way, dead cells are removed and the skin is vitalised and pampered. We recommend to use body scrubs in the shower.

Name: SACHA INCHI SKIN BALM
Dialog Product: At least 95% of natural and/or derived natural ingredients, where applicable, stem from organic agriculture or controlled harvesting of wild plants.
Ingredients: Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Oil*, Cocos Nucifera Oil*, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter*, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil*, Cera Alba*, Mangifera Indica Seed Butter*, Elaeis Guineensis Oil* * of controlled biological cultivation
Description: Our coconut skin balm Sacha Inchi is a treasure for damaged skin. It is based on virgin coconut oil, sheabutter and mango butter. The exotic oil does not only give the product a pleasant scent, it also acts as a natural protective coat for unsaturated fatty acids. The natural content of omega-3 fatty acids in the valuable Sacha Inchi oil protect and care for the skin. Red palm oil supplies it with antioxidants (vitamins A and E). The balm is ideally suited for the skin care of face and body and also soothes very dry skin areas like elbows or knees. Sacha Inchi – a botanic treasure Sacha Inchi oil contains 50 g alpha-linolenic acid, 35 g linoleic acid and around 10 g oleic acid per 100 g. That means that it has a similarly high content of alpha-linolenic acid like flaxseed oil. This essential fatty acid has regenerating and activating effects on the cells. Sacha Inchi oil has a characteristic, slightly bitter aroma which vanishes shortly after applying it to the skin. The oil is also known as treasure from the Amazon jungle. The indigenous people of the Amazon region and the Incas already appreciated the oil as rich skin care. In South America, Sacha Inchi oil is also a common edible oil. It is extracted from the Inca peanut, a weed-like plant from the family of the Euphorbiaceae. We purchase the Sacha Inchi liana from small organic farmers. This way, we support traditional cultivation methods, the future existence of old crops and species conservation.
Usage: - Sensitive skin care with Sacha Inchi oil: Our Sacha Inchi coconut skin balm is free from fragrance and essential oils. Therefore, it is especially skin-tolerable. It is most effective to apply the balm on damp skin after a mild cleansing. That way, the valuable ingredients can be absorbed particularly well. The balm also soothes irritated skin after shaving. - Mix & Match: Individual and unique: Every skin is different and so are its needs. Therefore, all of our skin care products can be mixed to match your individual needs. Our Sacha Inchi coconut skin balm can be combined with creams and lotions. Just add a small amount to your face cream for more skin elasticity and extra moisture. - Face or body scrubs: Skin scrubs can help the skin to regenerate and unclog the pores. Making your own scrub with our Sacha Inchi skin balm at home is very easy: Simply mix sea salt, coconut flower sugar, almond meal or coffee grounds (depending on the desired grain) with the balm, gently apply the mixture in circular movements and rinse with lukewarm water. This way, dead cells are removed and the skin is revitalised and pampered. We recommend to use body scrubs in the shower.

In visible light essential oils lose their scent and their healing properties. On the other hand, the invisible light preserves and activates oil molecules. Name: ZECHSTEIN MAGNESIUM FLAKES
Dialog Product: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
Ingredients: Magnesium Chloride Hexahydrate (MgCl2 concentration 47%)
Description: - Certified natural product; carries the NaTrue label - Skin compatibility rated “Very Good” by Dermatest® - Guaranteed 100% vegan, no animal testing - Free from additives - The original from the Zechstein mine Zechstein Magnesium Flakes is a bath additive made of pure magnesium chloride hexahydrate. The flakes are obtained by heating and drying the so-called Magnesium Oil. It is a totally natural product, free from any additives. The magnesium chloride concentration is around 47%. 1 g Magnesium Flakes contains approx. 120 mg pure magnesium.
Usage: A bath with Zechstein Magnesium Flakes is ideal for relaxing, regenerating after physical exertion, and nourishing the skin. Bath: Dissolve the entire content of the sachet in bath water and only add enough water to cover your body in order to ensure the highest possible concentration of magnesium in the bath water. Recommended bath temperature approx. 37°C, bath duration 20 to 30 minutes. Foot bath: Dissolve 150 g to 250 g Zechstein Magnesium Flakes in 5 liters of warm water (approx. 37°C) and soak your feet fr 20 to 30 minutes. Not fit for human consumption. Store in dry conditions. Immediately close the opened package again. Keep out of reach of children.

Name: ZECHSTEIN MAGNESIUM OIL CLASSIC
Dialog Product: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
Ingredients: Aqua, Magnesium Chloride.
Description: - For targeted local application - Helps with muscle tension release massages - THE original from the Zechstein mine - Skin compatibility rated “Very Good” by Dermatest® - Certified natural product; carries the NaTrue label - Guaranteed 100% vegan, no animal testing Zechstein Magnesium Oil classic is a totally natural product, free from any additives. It is derived from the depths of the ancient Zechstein Sea in the Netherlands, from one of the purest, natural magnesium sources in the world. Zechstein Magnesium Oil is a concentrated solution of magnesium chloride and water, and not actually an oil at all. It is, however, called “oil” because of its oily consistency. The magnesium chloride concentration is around 30%. 1 ml Magnesium Oil contains approx. 100 mg pure magnesium.
Usage: Local application Apply 5 to 10 sprays directly to the skin and massage in. The product can also be applied several times per day, if required. Magnesium oil is particularly suitable for sport fitness massages after sport, for muscle tension release massages, and for nourishing the skin. The solution can be left on the skin or washed off with water after approx. 15 minutes. Avoid contact with eyes, mucous membranes, and open wounds. Do not apply to freshly shaved areas. Wash hands after application. People with extremely sensitive skin may experience slight tingling, itching, or a warm sensation. Place out of reach of children.

Name: BASIS BALANCE MAGNESIUM OIL
Dialog Product: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
Ingredients: Aqua, Magnesium Chloride
Description: Magnesium 2.0 – regenerating and relaxing The innovative administration as magnesium oil for topical application is a special feature. The magnesium oil is presented in a light-resistant spray bottle that replicates the original environment of the product at 1500 m below the earth's surface. - the spray enables targeted application - supports deep-tissue massage for muscle tension - promotes regeneration of the skin - pH-neutral - skin compatibility dermatologically tested Purity from the Zechstein Sea One of the purest sources of magnesium chloride is found underground: dried-up primordial seas, untouched by contemporary environmental contaminants. In this context, the Zechstein Sea is one of the most well-known ancient seas. 250 million years ago, it reached from England over the Netherlands and Germany to Russia. Today, the minerals that were left behind after the lake dried up are found in different subterranean layers. The valuable natural magnesium chloride is encountered at around 1500 meters under the earth's surface and turns into magnesium oil with the addition of water. This naturally extracted 31.6% solution is unusual in that it is ready for use and can be applied directly. It is neither reduced, supplemented nor chemically purified. Only products that display the Zechstein logo contain this unique magnesium oil.
Usage: Basis Balance® Magnesium Oil is a versatile mineral spray. It can be used for skin care and for massage support for muscle tension. The mineral spray can be sprayed directly onto the skin and rubbed in gently. If required, multiple daily applications are possible. After about 10-15 minutes, the liquid that has not been absorbed can be washed off with clean water. The recommended dosage is 10-15 sprays.
